CHEBI:17309 pectin Any mixture of complex, colloidal, macromolecular plant galacturonans containing a large proportion of D-galactopyranosyluronic acid residues in α-(1→4) linkage, the carboxy groups of which may be esterified to varying degrees by methyl groups or be partially or completely converted into salts.
